mapper.select: SELECT bb.bookNO AS BOOKNO, bb.BOOKTITLE AS TITLE, bb.NAME AS NAME, bb.BOOKDATE AS BDATE, bb.BVIEWCNT AS VIEWCNT, bf.ID FROM B_BOOK bb, B_FAVO bf WHERE bb.BOOKNO = bf.BOOKNO AND bf.ID =#{id}

SELECT pb.PAGEPAY AS PAGEPAY, pb.PAGENO AS PAGENO, pb.PAGEPAYDATE AS PBDATE, pb.PISREFUND AS REFUND, p.PVIEWCNT AS VIEWCNT, p.PAGETITLE AS TITLE, p.SERIES AS SERIES, p.PAGEDATE AS PDATE FROM B_PAGEBUY pb, B_PAGE p WHERE pb.PAGENO = p.PAGENO AND pb.ID = #{id}
SELECT bc.COINMETHOD AS METHOD, bc.RECHARGECOIN AS COIN, bc.COINDATE AS CDATE, bc.CISREFUND AS REFUND FROM B_COINHISTORY bc WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT p.PAGENO AS PAGENO, p.SERIES AS SERIES, p.PAGETITLE AS TITLE, p.BOOKNO AS BOOKNO, ba.AUTHORPROFIT AS PROFIT, ba.ISREALIZATION AS ISREALIZATION, ba.PAGEPAYDATE AS PPDATE FROM B_PAGE p, B_AUTHOR ba WHERE p.PAGENO = ba.PAGENO AND ba.ID = #{id}
